original_text: And after he became the father of Eber, Shelah lived 403 years and had other sons and daughters.
korean_text: 에벨을 낳은 후에 사백삼 년을 지내며 자녀를 낳았으며

sentences.original_text: And after he became the father of Eber
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 에버의 아버지가 된 후에

sentences.original_text: and had other sons and daughters
